categories: PhD Outdoor Ultra Light Adventure Crew Socks
description: Socks to inspire your next adventure, with artwork by Chris Benchetler and technology to keep your feet happy while you're out on the trails.Made of soft merino wool, nylon, elastane and polyester.4-degree elite fit system uses 2 types of elastic for stretch, recovery and to keep the sock in place.Indestructawool Technology in high-impact areas for durability and comfort.Mesh ventilation zones provide moisture management.Virtually Seamless™ toe for an irritation-free wear.
name: Smartwool PhD Outdoor Ultra Light Adventure Crew Socks - Unisex
